content.title: Add a Button Widget
content.body:
1. From the lower-left corner of Iris, navigate to the Default Library and click on the search icon. In the search bar, enter Button.
  2. From the results, select Button, and drop the widget onto the deviceSettings form in the canvas.
  3. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Project explorer, expand Mobile > Forms > deviceSettings.
  4. Right-click on the new button widget and rename the button btnSettings.
